formatDescription: Praat is a computer software package for the scientific analysis of speech in phonetics, developed by Paul Boersma and David Weenink of the University of Amsterdam. The Praat script file acts like a set of macros, allowing the user to rerun a set of actions as often as needed.
provenanceCompoundName: University of British Columbia / University of British Columbia
